LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_NutrientSolution.des: A thick slurry of high protein and high calorie substances which has a vaguely honey-like consistency, albeit with a blander taste that is neither offensive nor sweet. This solution is unstabilized, and must be treated with chemical capsules to achieve its notoriously non-spoiling state.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_NutrientBlock.label: nutrition block
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_NutrientBlock.descri: A dense, nutrition rich block created by stabilizing nutrient solution with chemical capsules. Akin to a crumbly form of cheese, this substance will never expire and is full of essential nutrients for sustenance.
